## ApiResponse.text() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Text representation of the response body. See the [\`text\` method of the Fetch API Response](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Response/text)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
text(): Promise<string>;
```

Promise&lt;string&gt;
